DO I LISTEN TO MY DISCOURAGEMENT OR DO I LISTEN TO THE MAJOR WANT TO BE ABLE TO DO MUSIC BY THE WAY I HOPE THIS ALL MADE SENSE THANK YOU

1.8.19  11:31 pm   So you seem like someone who is talented when it comes to making yourself get work done. So, I was wondering if I could like pitch you an idea that I thought of trying for myself to start making more music, and see if you had any feedback? idk. The plan would be for me to spend, for each song, three days on the melody, then three days on the harmony, then three days on the percussion, then three days on the bassline, and finish with two days to revise and edit. Do you think this is a good plan? Anyway, love everything you do! Keep it up! <3
